_source.text: A friend who knew him well for forty years said "no man knew better than Andrew Jackson when to get into a passion and when not." James Parton commented that Jackson's anger was "a Scotch-Irish anger.

text: A friend who knew him well for forty years said "no man knew **better** **than** **Andrew** **Jackson** when to get
into a passion and when not." **James** Parton commented that Jackson's anger was "a Scotch-Irish anger.

_source.text: (a) 1. Starman by James Robinson - Nothing has defined my relationship with my family better than this.

text: (a) 1. Starman by **James** **Robinson** - Nothing has defined my relationship with my family **better** **than** this.

_source.text: A couple quick hits on some of the other comments...sorry but I know he's only a rookie and plays for my favorite team, so I'm probably biased a little, but if he holds true and gets better, Mike Williams will be better than Ocho, if not already better than him.

text: A couple quick hits on some of the other comments...sorry but I know he's only a rookie and plays for my favorite team, so I'm probably biased a little, but if he holds true and gets better, **Mike** **Williams** will be **better** **than** Ocho, if not already **better** **than** him.
